body:
Looking at [h5z-zfp package logic for 0.7.0 and 0.8.0 releases](https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/46c15132964b482ca0808cc8700c980407562095/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/h5z-zfp/package.py#L17), the commit hashes do not agree with what I see for that package (pictured below) when I look at those releases on GitHub. Is this a problem or am I confused?

![Untitled 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5720676/60360981-d9821780-9991-11e9-9600-353cd4441fe3.png)
title: Package commit hashes don't coincide with release tags
